author: Ben Kew
description: Michael Madigan describes comparisons between the Watergate scandal and the firing of FBI Director James Comey's as "bordering on the absurd."
title: Former Watergate Counsel: Trump-Nixon Comparisons 'Border on the Absurd' - Breitbart

author: Ian Mason
description: John McCain: Comey Leaks 'of Watergate Size and Scale'
title: John McCain: Comey Leaks 'of Watergate Size and Scale' - Breitbart

author: The Economist
description: Fresh scandals put the presidency in crisis, but not at risk of an impeachment
title: Donald Trump and the shadow of Watergate

author: Eugene Scott, CNN
description: Sen. John McCain invoked Watergate in describing the escalating controversy surrounding alleged ties between President Donald Trump's campaign and Russia.
title: McCain: Russia probe reaching the point 'of Watergate size'

author: Ariel Edwards-Levy
description: The president can only dream of an approval rating as high as Nixon's in the early months of Watergate.
title: Trump Didn't Need A Watergate To Sink His Ratings To Nixonian Levels

author: Fred Imbert, Evelyn Cheng
description: The iShares MSCI Brazil Capped ETF (EWZ) crashed more than 17 percent on the back of an emerging political scandal.
title: Brazil stocks plunge 10% on emerging political scandal

author: Mark Abadi
description: McCain compared recent reports about Donald Trump to the biggest scandal in modern political history.
title: John McCain on recent reports about Trump: 'It's reaching Watergate size and scale'

author: https://www.facebook.com/rachael.bade.9
description: Republicans are worried, even panicked, about their scandal-plagued president and what it could mean for the GOP agenda.
title: Alarm spreads among Hill Republicans over Comey scandal

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/sarah-gerathy/4980248
description: A leaked copy of the report into the St Vincent's Hospital chemotherapy dosing scandal finds there was a possible cover-up.
title: St Vincent's Hospital 'possibly covered up chemo dosage scandal'

author: Bernie Woodall
description: A former U.S. Navy admiral at the center of a massive bribery scandal was sentenced on Wednesday to 18 months in prison for choosing "karaoke over character," U.S. prosecutors said.
title: Former U.S. Navy admiral sentenced to 18 months in bribery scandal
